Body:
betas = np.linspace(0.0, 0.99, 10)
tmm.P1.pol = polP1
tmm.P2.pol = polP2
tmm.Gen.pol = polGen
tmm.P1.wave.waveType = waveType
sr = tmm.Sweep('beta', betas, betas, outP1=False, outP2=False)
srW = tmm.WaveSweep('beta', betas, betas, outP1=False, outP2=False)
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.Gen.Pr, sr.Gen.Ir * srW.Gen.beamArea, rtol=0.01)
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.Gen.Pt, sr.Gen.It * srW.Gen.beamArea, rtol=0.06)
